original: Thero “sādhū”ti sampaṭicchitvā dasa upāsakassa upāsakaguṇe paridīpesi.
analyzed: theraḥ sādhu uti sampaṭicchitvā dasa upāsakassa upāsaka guṇe paridīpesi
dasa ime mahā rāja upāsakassa upāsaka guṇāḥ

original: Katame dasa, idha, mahārāja, upāsako saṅghena samānasukhadukkho hoti, dhammādhipateyyo hoti, yathābalaṁ saṁvibhāgarato hoti, jinasāsanaparihāniṁ disvā abhivaḍḍhiyā vāyamati.
analyzed: katame dasa idha mahā rāja upāsakaḥ saṅghena samāna sukha dukkhaḥ hoti dhamma ādhipateyyaḥ hoti yathābalam savibhāga rataḥ hoti jina sāsana parihānim disvā abhivaḍḍhiyā vā āyamati

original: Sammādiṭṭhiko hoti, apagatakotūhalamaṅgaliko jīvitahetupi na aññaṁ satthāraṁ uddisati,
analyzed: sammādiṭṭhikaḥ hoti apagata kotūhala maṅgalikaḥ jīvita hetu pi na aññam satthāram uddisati

original: kāyikavācasikañcassa rakkhitaṁ hoti, samaggārāmo hoti samaggarato, anusūyako hoti,
analyzed: kāyika vācasikañca assa rakkhitam hoti samagga ārāmaḥ hoti samagga rataḥ anusūyakaḥ hoti

original: na ca kuhanavasena sāsane carati, buddhaṁ saraṇaṁ gato hoti, dhammaṁ saraṇaṁ gato
analyzed: na ca kuhana vasena sāsane carati buddham saraṇam gataḥ hoti dhammam saraṇam gataḥ

original: Ime kho, mahārāja, dasa upāsakassa upāsakaguṇā, te sabbe guṇā tayi saṁvijjanti, taṁ
analyzed: ime kho mahā rāja dasa upāsakassa upāsaka guṇā te sabbe guṇā tayi savijjanti

original: te yuttaṁ pattaṁ anucchavikaṁ patirūpaṁ yaṁ tvaṁ jinasāsanaparihāniṁ disvā abhivaḍḍhiṁ
analyzed: te yuttam pattam anucchavikam pati rūpam yam tvam jina sāsana parihānim disvā abhivaḍḍhi

original: icchasi, karomi te okāsaṁ, puccha maṁ tvaṁ yathāsukhan”ti.
analyzed: icchasi karomi te okāsa puccha mam tvam
